document.full_text: researchers say the tools may be as old as 15,500 years, retiring a long-held hypothesis that the so-called clovis people, who came from asia 13,000 years ago, were the first to arrive.
document.title: arrowheads found in texas dial back arrival of humans in america
lines_and_colors: researchers say the tools may be as old as 15,500 years, retiring a long-held hypothesis that the so-called clovis people, who came from asia 13,000 years ago, were the first to arrive.
